dict.acceptation: 小心谨慎地；警惕地；仔细地；周密地；

sent.orig: Wang always did all his work carefully, so his children did their schoolwork carefully.
sent.trans: 王先生工作起来一丝不苟，因此他的孩子们学习也很认真仔细。

sent.orig: They did the experiment as carefully asas carefully as possible.
sent.trans: 他们尽可能细致地做实验。

sent.orig: To be brief, you should listen to the sounds carefully and keep the record carefully.
sent.trans: 简言之，声音值得仔细倾听，唱片值得小心收藏。

sent.orig: Carefully complete the operation, the examination questions carefully scrutinize, inspect, for a good grade!
sent.trans: 认真完成作业，考试认真审题，检查，争取取得好成绩！
